argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_ax-hilex | |- ~H e. _V |
| 2 | 1 | #P_mptex | |- ( y e. ~H |-> ( y .ih x ) ) e. _V |
| 3 |  | #P_df-bra | |- bra = ( x e. ~H |-> ( y e. ~H |-> ( y .ih x ) ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_fnmpti | |- bra Fn ~H |
| 5 |  | #P_rnbra | |- ran bra = ( LinFn i^i ConFn ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fveq1 | |- ( ( bra ` x ) = ( bra ` y ) -> ( ( bra ` x ) ` z ) = ( ( bra ` y ) ` z ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_braval | |- ( ( x e. ~H /\ z e. ~H ) -> ( ( bra ` x ) ` z ) = ( z .ih x ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantlr | |- ( ( ( x e. ~H /\ y e. ~H ) /\ z e. ~H ) -> ( ( bra ` x ) ` z ) = ( z .ih x ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_braval | |- ( ( y e. ~H /\ z e. ~H ) -> ( ( bra ` y ) ` z ) = ( z .ih y ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_adantll | |- ( ( ( x e. ~H /\ y e. ~H ) /\ z e. ~H ) -> ( ( bra ` y ) ` z ) = ( z .ih y ) ) |
| 11 | 8, 10 | #P_eqeq12d | |- ( ( ( x e. ~H /\ y e. ~H ) /\ z e. ~H ) -> ( ( ( bra ` x ) ` z ) = ( ( bra ` y ) ` z ) <-> ( z .ih x ) = ( z .ih y ) ) ) |
| 12 | 6, 11 | #P_syl5ib | |- ( ( ( x e. ~H /\ y e. ~H ) /\ z e. ~H ) -> ( ( bra ` x ) = ( bra ` y ) -> ( z .ih x ) = ( z .ih y ) ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_ralrimdva | |- ( ( x e. ~H /\ y e. ~H ) -> ( ( bra ` x ) = ( bra ` y ) -> A. z e. ~H ( z .ih x ) = ( z .ih y ) ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_hial2eq2 | |- ( ( x e. ~H /\ y e. ~H ) -> ( A. z e. ~H ( z .ih x ) = ( z .ih y ) <-> x = y ) ) |
| 15 | 13, 14 | #P_sylibd | |- ( ( x e. ~H /\ y e. ~H ) -> ( ( bra ` x ) = ( bra ` y ) -> x = y ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_rgen2a | |- A. x e. ~H A. y e. ~H ( ( bra ` x ) = ( bra ` y ) -> x = y ) |
| 17 |  | #P_dff1o6 | |- ( bra : ~H -1-1-onto-> ( LinFn i^i ConFn ) <-> ( bra Fn ~H /\ ran bra = ( LinFn i^i ConFn ) /\ A. x e. ~H A. y e. ~H ( ( bra ` x ) = ( bra ` y ) -> x = y ) ) ) |
| 18 | 4, 5, 16, 17 | #P_mpbir3an | |- bra : ~H -1-1-onto-> ( LinFn i^i ConFn ) |
